text: Akar kam a Godɨn akam, a Godɨn ize. Ezɨ tina akar kam dɨpontɨma igharaz darazi a baraghtɨ, a bar akongegh. Gumazamiziba akar kam baraghɨva egh Godɨn akar kɨ osirizimɨn gɨn mangɨva, me uaghan bar akongegh. Dughiam otivasava ami, eghtɨ God damuasa mɨkemezir biziba a adar amuam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazamiziba akar kam dɨpon.
